

| Q                        | A
| ------------------------ | ---
| Service                  | (gofer, spectre, spire etc)
| Fixed Issues?            | `Fixes #1, Fixes #2`
| Patch: Bug Fix?          |
| Major: Breaking Change?  |
| Minor: New Feature?      |
| Tests Added + Pass?      | Yes
| Documentation PR         | `[skip-ci]`
| Any Dependency Changes?  |
| License                  | AGPL
